output_list.reason: The mint function does not check if the token amount to be minted exceeds the total supply. This can lead to token devalue as the total supply is not updated accordingly.
The function name 'showMyTokenBalance' has a typo in the code. It should be 'showMyTokenBalance' instead of 'showMyTokenBalance'.
The approve function does not check if the spender is a contract address. This can lead to access control issues as the contract may not be able to use the approved tokens.
The transferFrom function does not check if the sender has enough tokens to transfer. This can lead to access control issues as the contract may not be able to transfer tokens from the sender.
The transfer function does not check if the recipient is a contract address. This can lead to access control issues as the contract may not be able to receive tokens from the sender.
